Natural.Label: Естественное поглощение
Natural.Hint: Естественное поглощение применяется, когда не надета броня или, если значение естественного поглощения выше полглощения брони.

Skills.AdjustTooltip:
ЛКМ для повышения ранга {skill}
ПКМ для понижения ранга {skill}
Skills.SetTooltip:
ЛКМ для изменения ранга {skill}
ПКМ для сброса ранга {skill}

Ancestry.label: Народ
Ancestry.desc_placeholder: Добавьте описание народа и любые особые правила, связанные с ним.

Culture.label: Культура
Culture.desc_placeholder: Добавьте описание одной из множества культур и любые особые правила, связанные с ней.

Path.label: Путь
Path.desc_placeholder: Опишите путь и персонажей, которые следуют по нему.

Specialty.label: Специализация
Specialty.desc_placeholder: Опишите специализацию и персонажей, которые владеют ею.

Injury.label: Травма
Injury.desc_placeholder: Опишите как травма влияет на персонажа.

Connection.label: Связь
Connection.desc_placeholder: Опишите персонажа ведущего и как они связаны с персонажем.

Ancestry.Label: Идентификатор народа
Ancestry.Hint: Идентификатор народа к которой принадлежит это действие (напр. "human").

Identifier.Hint: Используется как уникальный идентификатор этой силы. Идентификтор должен быть таким же, как у связанного навыка, только если не используется особый навык.

CustomSkill.Label: Использовать особый навык
CustomSkill.Hint: Будет использоваться особый навык вместо навыка со совпадающим идентификатором.

Skill.Label: Навык
Skill.Hint: Навык, связанный с этой силой. Получив силу, персонаж получает доступ к этому навыку.

Notification.PowerExists: Сила с идентификатором "{identifier}" уже существует у {actor}.

Power.Label: Идентификатор силы
Power.Hint: Идентификатор силы к которой принадлежит этот талант.

Modality.Label: Modality Identifier
Modality.Hint: Identifier of the modality this talent belongs to. (e.g. "stance")

create.Label: Created
create.Description: Triggered when this item is created, duplicated, added to an actor, or imported.

update.Label: Updated
update.Description: Triggered when this item is updated.

delete.Label: Deleted
delete.Description: Triggered when this item is deleted.

add-to-actor.Label: Added to Actor
add-to-actor.Description: Triggered when this item is added to an actor.

remove-from-actor.Label: Removed from Actor
remove-from-actor.Description: Triggered when this item is removed from an actor.

equip.Label: Equipped
equip.Description: Triggered when this item is equipped.

unequip.Label: Unequipped
unequip.Description: Triggered when this item is unequipped.

use.Label: Used
use.Description: Triggered when this item is used/rolled.

mode-activate.Label: Activated Modality
mode-activate.Description: Triggered when this item's mode becomes active for its modality.

mode-deactivate.Label: Deactivated Modality
mode-deactivate.Description: Triggered when this item's mode becomes inactive for its modality.

goal-complete.Label: Goal Completed
goal-complete.Description: Triggered when this Goal item is completed.

goal-progress.Label: Goal Progressed
goal-progress.Description: Triggered when this Goal item's progress is updated towards completion.

update-actor.Label: Actor Updated
update-actor.Description: Triggered when this item's parent actor is updated.

apply-damage-actor.Label: Actor Damaged
apply-damage-actor.Description: Triggered when damage is applied to this item's parent actor.

apply-injury-actor.Label: Actor Gained Injury
apply-injury-actor.Description: Triggered when an injury is applied to this item's parent actor.

short-rest-actor.Label: Actor Short Rested
short-rest-actor.Description: Triggered when this item's parent actor takes a short rest.

long-rest-actor.Label: Actor Long Rested
long-rest-actor.Description: Triggered when this item's parent actor takes a long rest.

Pick.Label: User picks
Pick.Hint: Whether the user should pick a number of expertises or if a specific set of expertises should be granted.

PickAmount.Label: Amount
PickAmount.Hint: The maximum number of expertises the user can pick.

AllowReplacement.Label: Allow Replacement
AllowReplacement.Hint: Whether to allow the user to replace a granted expertise if they already have it.

AvailableTypes.Label: Available Categories
AvailableTypes.Hint: The categories of expertises available to pick from.

AllowDuplicates.Label: Allow Duplicates
AllowDuplicates.Hint: Whether to grant items to the actor even if they already have them

IncreaseQuantity.Label: Increase Quantity
IncreaseQuantity.Hint: Whether to increase the quantity of physical items if the actor already has them

PickOne.Label: Pick One
PickOne.Hint: Whether to prompt the user to pick one item from the list of items to grant. If not enabled, all items will be granted.

PickPromptTitle.Label: Pick Prompt Title
PickPromptTitle.Hint: The title of the prompt shown when picking an item to grant.

Notify.Label: Notify User
Notify.Hint: Whether to send a notification to the user for each item granted.

modify-attribute.Title: Modify Attribute
modify-attribute.Description: Modifies an attribute of an actor.

Amount.Label: Amount
Amount.Hint: The amount to modify the attribute by. Can be positive or negative.

Bonus.Label: Modify Bonus
Bonus.Hint: Whether to modify the attribute bonus instead of the attribute itself.

Amount.Label: Amount
Amount.Hint: Значение, на которое нужно изменить ранг навыка. Может быть положительным или отрицательным.

ReduceQuantity.Label: Reduce Quantity
ReduceQuantity.Hint:
Whether to reduce the quantity of physical items instead of removing them outright.
Items reduced to 0 quantity will be removed.

Amount.Label: Amount
Amount.Hint: The amount of quantity to remove. Only used if "Reduce Quantity" is enabled and the item is physical.

set-attribute.Title: Set Attribute
set-attribute.Description: Sets the value of an attribute of an actor.

Value.Label: Value
Value.Hint: The value to set the attribute to.

Bonus.Label: Set Bonus
Bonus.Hint: Whether to set the attribute bonus instead of the attribute itself.

Value.Label: Value
Value.Hint: Значение, на которое нужно установить ранг навыка.

use-item.Title: Use item
use-item.Description: Uses an item by rolling it.

FastForward.Label: Fast Forward
FastForward.Hint: Whether to skip the roll dialog for the roll.

TemporaryDamageModifiers.Label: Damage Bonus
TemporaryDamageModifiers.Hint: Damage bonus formula to apply to the roll. Only items that can roll damage.

update-actor.Title: Update Actor
update-actor.Description: Updates an actor by applying a set of changes.

Target.Label: Target
Target.Hint: The target actor to update. If not set, the item's parent actor will be used.

update-item.Title: Update Item
update-item.Description: Updates an item by applying a set of changes.

MatchMode.Label: Match Mode
MatchMode.Hint:
How to match the item to update.
Identifier matches by the identifier set under Details.
Name matches by exact name, case sensitive.
UUID matches only the exact item.

MatchAll.Label: Match All
MatchAll.Hint: Whether to match all items or just the first one encountered.

MatchMode.Label: Match Mode
MatchMode.Hint:
How to match the item.
Identifier matches by the identifier set under Details.
Name matches by exact name, case sensitive.
UUID matches only the exact item.

MatchAll.Label: Match All
MatchAll.Hint: Whether to match all items or just the first one encountered.

Notification.ExceededMaxDepth: Exceeded maximum event chain depth. Aborting event execution.
Notification.RecentEventsExceeded: Exceeded maximum number of "{eventType}" events in a short period of time. Aborting event execution.

Identifier.Label: Identifier
Identifier.Hint: Used to uniquely identify this {type}. Identifier can only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), and underscores (_).

Ancestry.PathReferencePlaceholder: Drop Path Here to Set Free Path
Ancestry.TalentIdDescription: The identifier column should hold the identifier of the talent item you want characters with this Ancestry to have access to. The path identifier can only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), and underscores (_).

AdvancementTalentList.DropTalent: Drop Talent here to add to list

Warning.WrongType: The dropped Document must be of type Talent

Specialty.PathIdDescription: The identifier of the path this specialty belongs to. The path identifier can only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), and underscores (_).

Loot.IsMoneyDescription: Is this loot item a form of currency?

Activation.Title: Usage
Activation.AdditionalFormulaDescription: Введите дополнительные модификаторы, которые вы хотите добавить к d20 броску навыка этого предмета. Это значение является формулой кости, но любая кость, которую вы добавите, не будет доступна в качестве преимущества/помехи. Параметры, которые можно использовать: @mod, @attribute и @skill.rank относятся к значениям выбранных здесь навыков, но также можно получить доступ ко всему списку навыков и характеристик - обратитесь за помощью в Discord!

Damage.Title: Damage
Damage.GrazeHint: Formula entered here will be the entirety of the calculation for graze damage. Any die rolls will be rolled separately from the main damage roll. You can pull in all or part of the main roll using @damage.total/@damage.unmodded/@damage.dice (the latter being the system default) or the selected attribute mod with @mod

Talent.PathIdDescription: The identifier of the path this talent belongs to.
Talent.SpecialtyIdDescription: The identifier of the specialty this talent belongs to.
Talent.AncestryIdDescription: The identifier of the ancestry this talent belongs to.

Prerequisites.Label: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.DropTalents: Drop Talents here to add them to the list.
Prerequisites.DropGoals: Drop Goals here to add them to the list.

TalentTree.Label: Talent Tree
TalentTree.Hint: Talent tree that contains all talents for this path. This tree is displayed on the "talents" tab.

LinkedSkills.Label: Связанные навыки
LinkedSkills.Hint: Эти навыки отображаются рядом с {type} в бланке персонажа.

Buttons.DamageFull: Click to apply full damage to selected token(s).
Buttons.DamageHalf: Click to apply half damage to selected token(s).
Buttons.DamageDouble: Click to apply double damage to selected token(s).
Buttons.Healing: Click to apply healing to selected token(s).
Buttons.ReduceFocus: Click to reduce focus from selected token(s).
Buttons.ApplyInjury: Click to apply injury to character.

ChatMessage.Welcome:
Welcome to the Cosmere RPG!

Thank you for using the community-developed Cosmere Roleplaying Game system! You're running version {version}.

For news, support, or to connect with other players and developers, join us on the Metalworks Discord.

If you run into any issues or have suggestions for improvements, please let us know via our GitHub Issues page or by reaching out on Discord. Interested in contributing? Check out our contribution guidelines.

We hope you enjoy your journey through the Cosmere!

TemporaryBonus.Label: Temporary Bonus
TemporaryBonus.Hint: Введите опциональную формулу, которая будет применяться в качестве временного модификатора к этой проверке навыка.

Warning.MaxExpertises: Can only select up to {max} expertises.

ConfigureRoll.Title: Configure Rolls
ConfigureRoll.Hint: Left click or right click any individual die to apply advantage or disadvantage respectively.

Warning.DuplicateLevel: A rule for level {level} already exists

Warning.OutOfBounds: The selected bounds would place at least one talent outside the tree.

Warning.WrongType: The dropped Document must be of type {type}
Warning.WrongSubtype: The dropped {type} must be of type {subtype}

DocumentDropListComponent.Placeholder: Drop {type} here to add to list

Warning.DocumentAlreadyInList: The dropped {type} is already in the list
Warning.WrongType: The dropped Document must be of type {type}
Warning.WrongSubtype: The dropped {type} must be of type {subtype}

Notification.TalentCannotBeRemoved: Cannot remove talent {talent} from {actor} as it is a prerequisite for another talent

Warning.NoActor: No selected or assigned actor found for this roll
Warning.NotEnoughResource: Cannot consume, not enough of resource
Warning.NotEnoughUses: Cannot consume, not enough uses left
Warning.ItemConsumeResourceNotConfigured: The resource selected to be consumed is not configured on this item
Warning.NoFocus: Not enough focus to perform this action
Warning.TalentCannotBePrerequisiteOfItself: A talent cannot be a prerequisite of itself
Warning.DuplicatePrerequisiteTalentRef: A talent with id {talentId} already exists ({talentName})
Warning.ItemAlreadyInTree: An item with id "{itemId}" already exists in the {name} talent tree

Error.RegisteringConfigs: Error while registering configs. Check console for details.

Damage.NoFormula: No Formula or Dice Terms Provided
Damage.DoubleType: Damage Type Defined More Than Once

skipRollDialogByDefault.name: Skip Roll Dialog by Default
skipRollDialogByDefault.hint: If enabled, rolls will skip the roll configuration dialog when clicked, using the default roll configuration. The dialog can still be accessed by holding the 'Skip/Show Dialog' key modifier from the system controls.

skipDamageModDialogByDefault.name: Skip Damage Modifier Dialog by Default
skipDamageModDialogByDefault.hint: If enabled, the damage/healing card in chat will skip the modifier dialog when clicked, using the value shown in the card directly. The dialog can still be accessed by holding the 'Skip/Show Dialog' key modifier from the system controls.

enableOverlayButtons.name: Enable Overlay Buttons
enableOverlayButtons.hint: При выводе проверки навыка или броска урона, в сообщении чата будут дополнительные функциональные кнопки.

enableApplyButtons.name: Enable Apply Buttons
enableApplyButtons.hint: When outputting a damage roll, enable buttons on the chat message that allow for damage or healing to be applied to tokens, or to reduce focus from those tokens.

alwaysShowApplyButtons.name: Always Show Apply Buttons
alwaysShowApplyButtons.hint: When outputting a damage roll always show the apply buttons, instead of only on hover.

applyButtonsTo.name: Apply Button Options
applyButtonsTo.hint: Determines which tokens damage, healing, or focus reduction is applied to when applying via the chat card buttons.

expandDescriptionByDefault.name: Разворачивать описания по умолчанию
expandDescriptionByDefault.hint: При открытии бланка предета, блоки описаний будут автоматически развёрнуты.

skillIncrementDecrementToggle.name: Изменение ранга навыков ЛКМ/ПКМ
skillIncrementDecrementToggle.hint: При включении, навыки будут повышаться ЛКМ и понижаться ПКМ, вместо клика по рангу.

systemTheme.name: Preferred System Theme
systemTheme.hint: Specify the themed set of colours to use for system documents and interface elements. The selected theme will respect the preferred Dark/Light mode selected in the core settings.

StartingPath.Set: {actor}: выбран начальный путь {path}; выбран начальный навыки: {skill}
StartingPath.Replaced: {actor}: начальный путь {oldPath} заменён на {newPath}; выбран начальный навык: {skill}
StartingPath.Unset: {actor}: удалён начальный путь; удалён начальный навык: {skill}
